card.name: Accelerate
card.text: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Acorn Harvest
card.text: Put two 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens onto the battlefield. Flashback - {1}{G}, Pay 3 life.

card.name: Alter Reality
card.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. Flashback {1}{U}

card.name: Ambassador Laquatus
card.text: {3}: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Angel of Retribution
card.text: Flying, first strike

card.name: Anurid Scavenger
card.text: Protection from black At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Anurid Scavenger unless you put a card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Aquamoeba
card.text: Discard a card: Switch Aquamoeba's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Arrogant Wurm
card.text: Trample Madness {2}{G}

card.name: Aven Trooper
card.text: Flying {2}{W}, Discard a card: Aven Trooper gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Balshan Collaborator
card.text: Flying {B}: Balshan Collaborator gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Balthor the Stout
card.text: Other Barbarian creatures get +1/+1. {R}: Another target Barbarian creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Barbarian Outcast
card.text: When you control no Swamps, sacrifice Barbarian Outcast.

card.name: Basking Rootwalla
card.text: {1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn. Madness {0}

card.name: Boneshard Slasher
card.text: Flying Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Boneshard Slasher gets +2/+2 and has "When Boneshard Slasher becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

card.name: Breakthrough
card.text: Draw four cards, then choose X cards in your hand and discard the rest.

card.name: Cabal Coffers
card.text: {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each Swamp you control.

card.name: Cabal Ritual
card.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool. Threshold - Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Cabal Surgeon
card.text: {2}{B}{B}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Cabal Torturer
card.text: {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Threshold - {3}{B}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Carrion Rats
card.text: Whenever Carrion Rats attacks or blocks, any player may exile a card from his or her graveyard. If a player does, Carrion Rats assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Carrion Wurm
card.text: Whenever Carrion Wurm attacks or blocks, any player may exile three cards from his or her graveyard. If a player does, Carrion Wurm assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Centaur Chieftain
card.text: Haste Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Centaur Chieftain has "When Centaur Chieftain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn."

card.name: Centaur Veteran
card.text: Trample {G}, Discard a card: Regenerate Centaur Veteran.

card.name: Cephalid Aristocrat
card.text: Whenever Cephalid Aristocrat becomes the target of a spell or ability, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Cephalid Illusionist
card.text: Whenever Cephalid Illusionist becomes the target of a spell or ability, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. {2}{U}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target creature you control this turn.

card.name: Cephalid Sage
card.text: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Cephalid Sage has "When Cephalid Sage enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards."

card.name: Cephalid Snitch
card.text: Sacrifice Cephalid Snitch: Target creature loses protection from black until end of turn.

card.name: Cephalid Vandal
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a shred counter on Cephalid Vandal. Then put the top card of your library into your graveyard for each shred counter on Cephalid Vandal.

card.name: Chainer, Dementia Master
card.text: Nightmare creatures get +1/+1. {B}{B}{B}, Pay 3 life: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is black and is a Nightmare in addition to its other creature types. When Chainer, Dementia Master leaves the battlefield, exile all Nightmares.

card.name: Chainer's Edict
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B}

card.name: Churning Eddy
card.text: Return target creature and target land to their owners' hands.

card.name: Circular Logic
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard. Madness {U}

card.name: Cleansing Meditation
card.text: Destroy all enchantments. Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy all enchantments, then return all cards in your graveyard destroyed this way to the battlefield.

card.name: Compulsion
card.text: {1}{U}, Discard a card: Draw a card. {1}{U}, Sacrifice Compulsion: Draw a card.

card.name: Coral Net
card.text: Enchant green or white creature Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you discard a card."

card.name: Crackling Club
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0. Sacrifice Crackling Club: Crackling Club deals 1 damage to target creature.

card.name: Crazed Firecat
card.text: When Crazed Firecat enters the battlefield, flip a coin until you lose a flip. Put a +1/+1 counter on Crazed Firecat for each flip you win.

card.name: Crippling Fatigue
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Flashback - {1}{B}, Pay 3 life.

card.name: Dawn of the Dead
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Deep Analysis
card.text: Target player draws two cards. Flashback - {1}{U}, Pay 3 life.

card.name: Devastating Dreams
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Devastating Dreams, discard X cards at random. Each player sacrifices X lands. Devastating Dreams deals X damage to each creature.

card.name: Dwell on the Past
card.text: Target player shuffles up to four target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.

card.name: Enslaved Dwarf
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice Enslaved Dwarf: Target black creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Equal Treatment
card.text: If any source would deal 1 or more damage to a creature or player this turn, it deals 2 damage to that creature or player instead. Draw a card.

card.name: Faceless Butcher
card.text: When Faceless Butcher enters the battlefield, exile target creature other than Faceless Butcher. When Faceless Butcher leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: False Memories
card.text: Put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard. At the beginning of the next end step, exile seven cards from your graveyard.

card.name: Far Wanderings
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fiery Temper
card.text: Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Madness {R}

card.name: Flaming Gambit
card.text: Flaming Gambit deals X damage to target player. That player may choose a creature he or she controls and have Flaming Gambit deal that damage to it instead. Flashback {X}{R}{R}

card.name: Flash of Defiance
card.text: Green creatures and white creatures can't block this turn. Flashback - {1}{R}, Pay 3 life.

card.name: Floating Shield
card.text: Enchant creature As Floating Shield enters the battlefield, choose a color. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Floating Shield. Sacrifice Floating Shield: Target creature gains protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Frantic Purification
card.text: Destroy target enchantment. Madness {W}

card.name: Ghostly Wings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying. Discard a card: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Gloomdrifter
card.text: Flying Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Gloomdrifter has "When Gloomdrifter enters the battlefield, nonblack creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn."

card.name: Gravegouger
card.text: When Gravegouger enters the battlefield, exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. When Gravegouger leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's graveyard.

card.name: Grim Lavamancer
card.text: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Grotesque Hybrid
card.text: Whenever Grotesque Hybrid deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated. Discard a card: Grotesque Hybrid gains flying and protection from green and from white until end of turn.

card.name: Gurzigost
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Gurzigost unless you put two cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. {G}{G}, Discard a card: You may have Gurzigost assign its combat damage this turn as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Hell-Bent Raider
card.text: First strike, haste Discard a card at random: Hell-Bent Raider gains protection from white until end of turn.

card.name: Hydromorph Guardian
card.text: {U}, Sacrifice Hydromorph Guardian: Counter target spell that targets one or more creatures you control.

card.name: Hydromorph Gull
card.text: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Hydromorph Gull: Counter target spell that targets one or more creatures you control.

card.name: Hypnox
card.text: Flying When Hypnox enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, exile all cards from target opponent's hand. When Hypnox leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

card.name: Hypochondria
card.text: {W}, Discard a card: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. {W}, Sacrifice Hypochondria: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Ichorid
card.text: Haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ichorid. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Ichorid is in your graveyard, you may exile a black creature card other than Ichorid from your graveyard. If you do, return Ichorid to the battlefield.

card.name: Insidious Dreams
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Insidious Dreams, discard X cards. Search your library for X cards. Then shuffle your library and put those cards on top of it in any order.

card.name: Insist
card.text: The next creature spell you cast this turn can't be countered by spells or abilities. Draw a card.

card.name: Invigorating Falls
card.text: You gain life equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Kamahl's Sledge
card.text: Kamahl's Sledge deals 4 damage to target creature. Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead Kamahl's Sledge deals 4 damage to that creature and 4 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Krosan Constrictor
card.text: Swampwalk {T}: Target black creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Krosan Restorer
card.text: {T}: Untap target land. Threshold - {T}: Untap up to three target lands. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Laquatus's Champion
card.text: When Laquatus's Champion enters the battlefield, target player loses 6 life. When Laquatus's Champion leaves the battlefield, that player gains 6 life. {B}: Regenerate Laquatus's Champion.

card.name: Last Laugh
card.text: Whenever a permanent other than Last Laugh is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Last Laugh deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. When no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Last Laugh.

card.name: Liquify
card.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 3 or less. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Llawan, Cephalid Empress
card.text: When Llawan, Cephalid Empress enters the battlefield, return all blue creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands. Your opponents can't cast blue creature spells.

card.name: Longhorn Firebeast
card.text: When Longhorn Firebeast enters the battlefield, any opponent may have it deal 5 damage to him or her. If a player does, sacrifice Longhorn Firebeast.

card.name: Major Teroh
card.text: Flying {3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Major Teroh: Exile all black creatures.

card.name: Mesmeric Fiend
card.text: When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Militant Monk
card.text: Vigilance {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Mind Sludge
card.text: Target player discards a card for each Swamp you control.

card.name: Morningtide
card.text: Exile all cards from all graveyards.

card.name: Mortal Combat
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if twenty or more creature cards are in your graveyard, you win the game.

card.name: Mortiphobia
card.text: {1}{B}, Discard a card: Exile target card from a graveyard. {1}{B}, Sacrifice Mortiphobia: Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Mutilate
card.text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.

card.name: Mystic Familiar
card.text: Flying Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Familiar gets +1/+1 and has protection from black.

card.name: Nantuko Blightcutter
card.text: Protection from black Threshold - Nantuko Blightcutter gets +1/+1 for each black permanent your opponents control as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nantuko Calmer
card.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Nantuko Calmer: Destroy target enchantment. Threshold - Nantuko Calmer gets +1/+1 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nantuko Cultivator
card.text: When Nantuko Cultivator enters the battlefield, you may discard any number of land cards. Put that many +1/+1 counters on Nantuko Cultivator and draw that many cards.

card.name: Nantuko Shade
card.text: {B}: Nantuko Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Narcissism
card.text: {G}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {G}, Sacrifice Narcissism: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Nostalgic Dreams
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Nostalgic Dreams, discard X cards. Return X target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Nostalgic Dreams.

card.name: Obsessive Search
card.text: Draw a card. Madness {U}

card.name: Organ Grinder
card.text: {T}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Target player loses 3 life.

card.name: Overmaster
card.text: The next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn can't be countered by spells or abilities. Draw a card.

card.name: Parallel Evolution
card.text: For each creature token on the battlefield, its controller puts a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield. Flashback {4}{G}{G}{G}

card.name: Pardic Arsonist
card.text: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Pardic Arsonist has "When Pardic Arsonist enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player."

card.name: Pardic Collaborator
card.text: First strike {B}: Pardic Collaborator gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Pardic Lancer
card.text: Discard a card at random: Pardic Lancer gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Pay No Heed
card.text: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

card.name: Petradon
card.text: When Petradon enters the battlefield, exile two target lands. When Petradon leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control. {R}: Petradon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Petravark
card.text: When Petravark enters the battlefield, exile target land. When Petravark leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Pitchstone Wall
card.text: Defender Whenever you discard a card, you may sacrifice Pitchstone Wall. If you do, return the discarded card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Plagiarize
card.text: Until end of turn, if target player would draw a card, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Possessed Aven
card.text: Flying Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Aven gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target blue creature."

card.name: Possessed Barbarian
card.text: First strike Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Barbarian gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target red creature."

card.name: Possessed Centaur
card.text: Trample Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Centaur gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature."

card.name: Possessed Nomad
card.text: Vigilance Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Nomad gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature."

card.name: Psychotic Haze
card.text: Psychotic Haze deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Madness {1}{B}

card.name: Putrid Imp
card.text: Discard a card: Putrid Imp gains flying until end of turn. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Putrid Imp gets +1/+1 and can't block.

card.name: Pyromania
card.text: {1}{R}, Discard a card at random: Pyromania deals 1 damage to target creature or player. {1}{R}, Sacrifice Pyromania: Pyromania deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Radiate
card.text: Choose target instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single permanent or player. Copy that spell for each other permanent or player the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those permanents and players.

card.name: Rancid Earth
card.text: Destroy target land. Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy that land and Rancid Earth deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Reborn Hero
card.text: Vigilance Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Reborn Hero has "When Reborn Hero dies, you may pay {W}{W}. If you do, return Reborn Hero to the battlefield under your control."

card.name: Restless Dreams
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Restless Dreams, discard X cards. Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Retraced Image
card.text: Reveal a card in your hand, then put that card onto the battlefield if it has the same name as a permanent.

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

card.name: Seton's Scout
card.text: Reach Threshold - Seton's Scout gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Shade's Form
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn." When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Shambling Swarm
card.text: When Shambling Swarm dies, distribute three -1/-1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each -1/-1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a -1/-1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Sickening Dreams
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Sickening Dreams, discard X cards. Sickening Dreams deals X damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Skullscorch
card.text: Target player discards two cards at random unless that player has Skullscorch deal 4 damage to him or her.

card.name: Skywing Aven
card.text: Flying Discard a card: Return Skywing Aven to its owner's hand.

card.name: Slithery Stalker
card.text: Swampwalk When Slithery Stalker enters the battlefield, exile target green or white creature an opponent controls. When Slithery Stalker leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Sonic Seizure
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Sonic Seizure, discard a card at random. Sonic Seizure deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Soul Scourge
card.text: Flying When Soul Scourge enters the battlefield, target player loses 3 life. When Soul Scourge leaves the battlefield, that player gains 3 life.

card.name: Spirit Flare
card.text: Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, it deals damage equal to its power to target attacking or blocking creature an opponent controls. Flashback - {1}{W}, Pay 3 life.

card.name: Stern Judge
card.text: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Swamp he or she controls.

card.name: Strength of Isolation
Strength of Lunacy
Stupefying Touch
card.text: Enchant creature When Stupefying Touch enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature's activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Tainted Field
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Tainted Isle
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Tainted Peak
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Tainted Wood
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Temporary Insanity
card.text: Untap target creature with power less than the number of cards in your graveyard and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Teroh's Faithful
card.text: When Teroh's Faithful enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Teroh's Vanguard
card.text: Flash Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Teroh's Vanguard has "When Teroh's Vanguard enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain protection from black until end of turn."

card.name: Transcendence
card.text: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. When you have 20 or more life, you lose the game. Whenever you lose life, you gain 2 life for each 1 life you lost.

card.name: Turbulent Dreams
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Turbulent Dreams, discard X cards. Return X target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.

card.name: Unhinge
card.text: Target player discards a card. Draw a card.

card.name: Vengeful Dreams
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Vengeful Dreams, discard X cards. Exile X target attacking creatures.

card.name: Violent Eruption
card.text: Violent Eruption deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Madness {1}{R}{R}

card.name: Waste Away
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Waste Away, discard a card. Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

card.name: Zombie Trailblazer
card.text: Tap an untapped Zombie you control: Target land becomes a Swamp until end of turn. Tap an untapped Zombie you control: Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn.
